description: This file defines a health check route for a Flask web application using Flask-Smorest. It sets up a blueprint with a single endpoint that responds with a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class handling GET requests for health status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating the service is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
